text: Jean-Michel Boris (14 February 1933 â€“ 6 November 2020) was a French artistic director. He was Director General of the concert hall Olympia from 1979 to 2001. He was born in Bordeaux, France. Boris died on 6 November 2020 in Paris, aged 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French artists
title: Jean-Michel Boris
